name: Captain Road
description:
Captain Road

Defeat enemies and build your vehicle out of its scattered parts to become Captain of the Roads!

Controls
WS - Move Forward / Backward
AD - Rotate Left / Right
LMB - Hold to Aim and Shoot
RMB / LALT - Toggle follow mouse
MMB - Hold to follow mouse
LSHIFT - Hold to Aim with mouse
LCTRL / SPACE / F - Shoot
TILDE~ - Sandbox Menu
Click and Drag floating ship parts and connect them to your ship!

Levels
Red - 0
Orange - 1
Yellow - 2
Green - 3
Cyan - 4
Blue - 5
Purple - 6
Pink - 7
Light grey - 8
Dark grey - 9

Credits
By: Ian Bishop
Tools used:
Unity3D
Visual Studio Code
Paint.NET
Notepad++
Git
bfxr
Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com

This is my entry for LD40!

This game includes procedural level generation and player vehicle customization! 

Feel free to share your ship! (Pause the game to access ship loading)

Enjoy!
